E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Horacio Velazquez
Dear Sir,
Horacio Velazquez isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .232, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1986
Subject: Status of John Aguiar
Dear Sir,
John Aguiar shouldn't play at AA !
He has an AVG of .247 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
